author: antelder
msg: Initial support for the SCAClient API, probably better ways we can do this but this is the simplest way to get it working as a starting point

author: antelder
msg: Start adding the new non-SCA client API proposal code (see http://lists.oasis-open.org/archives/sca-j/200903/msg00121.html). This is code mostly from that initial proposal with minimal change sto get it to work in Tuscany, so it needs updating from the rest of that email thread

author: cziegeler
msg: PLUTO-545 : Move container driver api into own module.

author: jacopoc
msg: ant targets to create/apply/revert patches for the framework, applications and specialpurpose: they are available in the ant script for auto generated hot-deploy components.
Thanks to Seema Tiwari & Ritika Somani for the patch.
